title: John Heitinga appointed head coach of Ajax
snippet: Ajax has reached an agreement with Liverpool and John Heitinga regarding the coach’s move to Amsterdam. Marcel Keizer will be his assistant.

title: John Heitinga - Wikipedia
snippet: On 6 November 2025, just 5 months after being announced as head coach of Ajax, Heitinga was dismissed following the club's 3–0 home defeat to Turkish side Galatasaray in the Champions League, which saw them sit bottom of the league phase table, failing to secure a point in their 4 matches.

title: Eredivisie | Ajax suspends John Heitinga with immediate effect
snippet: Ajax is looking for a new head coach; in the meantime, Fred Grim will take over Heitinga’s duties.

title: Ajax suspends John Heitinga with immediate effect
snippet: Ajax is looking for a new head coach; in the meantime, Fred Grim will take over Heitinga’s duties.

title: Ajax: John Heitinga leaves Liverpool role to rejoin Dutch club as head coach - BBC Sport
snippet: The 41-year-old has rejoined the club on a two-year contract and will be assisted by another Ajax academy product, Marcel Keizer. Heitinga succeeds Francesco Farioli, who left Ajax last week after his sole year in charge ended with an end-of-season ...
